PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 5 The initial PCE reached 3.6% 6 in a typical BHJ device and has been subsequently improved to exceeding 6% by BHJ layer thickness optimization and nanomorphology control using mixed solvent mixtures.

Let's think step by step.

1. "PCE" (Power Conversion Efficiency) is a Property Name in the given paragraph.
2. "BHJ device" (Bulk Heterojunction device) can be considered as a Property Name in a broader sense, as it refers to a type of organic solar cell with specific structural and functional characteristics.
3. "BHJ layer thickness" is a Property Name, as it refers to the measurement of the physical dimension of the BHJ layer.
4. "Nanomorphology" is a Property Name, as it refers to the nanoscale structure and arrangement of the materials within the BHJ layer.
5. "Mixed solvent mixtures" can be considered a Property Name, as it refers to the specific combination of solvents used to control the nanomorphology of the BHJ layer.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)
2. BHJ layer thickness
3. Nanomorphology

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |
| BHJ layer thickness |
| Nanomorphology |
